oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mule Imbroglio Letter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; correspondence; Civil War; military;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Col. Colton Greene, in the field, to Lt. Col. Samuel J. Ward: requests details of conversation between Ward and Capt. Hooper concerning Greene's role in the mule-order dispute; requests deposition to state whether or not Greene ever counseled officers to disobey the order. 2 apparent handwritten copies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Greene, Colton
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
